body:
RESULTS: https://avicus.net/forums/776ca24b9

When »
Sunday, 8/9/2015
3:00 PM EST
8:00 PM BST
5:00 AM AEST (im so sorry ;-;)

Where »
We will first test maps on a public DTM03 server, but later we may move to server MapDev for extra testing and walls maps! Stay updated on this thread: we'll tell you what server we're playing on and when we move to the MapDev server!
Notice: Currently the MapDev server is down, hopefully it will get fixed before the testing!

Map List »
The map list and grading sheet can be viewed here. The map list is not final so expect changes.

Plug DJ »
Feel free to hop on the Avicus plug.dj room to listen to some music while you play! plug.dj/avicus

More information »
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1BZi1x4-Af_nj3piRVVbZxVNPBxmtrs9qomqOMqpzbYs/edit?usp=sharing

We apologize for the late notice
